column1: Fishermen bulletin for strong winds and rough seas
Issued by Marine Forecasting Division, National Meteorological Centre
For the Bay of Bengal and Arabian Sea
Wind speed will be (40-50) kmph gusting up to 60 kmph. These sea areas will be rough at
State of Sea: Calm (0-5) kmph, Smooth (5-15) kmph, Slight (16-28) kmph, Moderate (29-37) kmph. km, Fairly rough (38-46)
kmph, Rough (47-55) kmph, Very rough (56-74) kmph, High (75-102) kmph, Very high (over 103) kmph.
